org.schema.schine.network.server

Class ServerState

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • org.schema.schine.network.server.ServerState
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ServerStateInterface, org.schema.schine.network.StateInterface

    public abstract class ServerState
extends java.util.Observable
implements ServerStateInterface
    Contains data about the state of the server.
